titles.title: To require executive agencies to establish expedited review procedures for granting a waiver to a State under a grant program administered by the agency if another State has already been granted a similar waiver by the agency under such program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Efficiency, Financial Management and Intergovernmental Relations.

committee.subcommittee: Government Efficiency, Financial Management and Intergovernmental Relations
committee.name: House Government Reform

bill.summary: 2/28/2001--Introduced. Directs the head of each executive agency to establish expedited review procedures under which a State may be granted a waiver under an agency grant program if another State has already been granted a similar waiver.
